title: Lobato (João Carvalho)
body: Several years ago, several North American newspapers referred with great praise and some breadth to this Madeiran for his discoveries, especially in the field of mechanics and electricity, having obtained some 'patents of invention' for these inventions in various European countries. The latest news we have about him was published in the Madeiran periodical 'O Jornal' on February 26, 1932, which includes a detailed and interesting article about him.

United States: Location where newspapers referred to João Carvalho Lobato

1932: Year of the publication of the article about João Carvalho Lobato in O Jornal
